name: Crystal Forest
description:
Join Maria on an adventure to find what she has lost in the midst of a haunted forest, evade the demons that try to eliminate her and strategically attack with magic crystals that reflect the projectiles like a mirror.

Use your imagination and the reflection of your attacks to defeat powerful demons without being spotted.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Dash 

Left Click- Shoot projectiles

Created by Nazrryn & MissJohnDoe
